sysevent_email_action.message_html:
ASSOCIATE NAME = ${requested_for} 

ASSOCIATE WORKDAY ID = ${requested_for.u_workday_id} 

ASSOCIATE EMAIL ADDRESS = ${requested_for.email} 

 

Welcome to the Mobile Services Program!

Your manager has set your approved options for the Program to the following: 

Mobile Phone Approval: ${phone_approval}

IPad Approval: ${tablet_approval}

MiFi Approval: ${mifi_approval}

 

Information, Expectations, and Best Practices

Please visit the Mobile Services page on Inside Ecolab before enrolling in the program for information on your options regarding devices and program types.  It is your responsibility to understand the Mobile Services Program’s requirements and obligations prior to joining the Program.  Please contact us at mobile.services@ecolab.com or call us at 1-888-209-3733 Monday-Friday 7AM to 7PM CST or Saturday 8AM to 4PM CST for any questions regarding the Mobile Services Program.

Expectations include, but are not limited to, the following.

  • The Ecolab Mobile Services Program utilizes a shared/pooled data environment.  Data is NOT unlimited.  Reasonable and prudent use of Ecolab mobile service plans for personal use is permitted.
  • Ecolab does not support streaming movies or music with corporate-paid lines of service for non-business-related purposes.  Note that 1 hour of HD video streaming consumes up to 6GB of data.

How to Enroll in the Mobile Services Program

  • Go to the Inside IT Help Center > Products & Services > Place an Order.
  • Select the form relating to the device or service you wish to order.
  • Complete the form and submit.

It is our goal to ensure that your mobile experience is a positive one.

 

Thank you,  

 

ECOLAB MOBILE SERVICES GROUP
HELP DESK: 7AM-7PM CST, MONDAY - FRIDAY and 8AM-4PM CST, SATURDAY

ECOLAB 655 LONE OAK DRIVE, E5, EAGAN, MN 55121
T 888 209 3733  E mobile.services@ecolab.com

FOR MORE MSG INFORMATION, CLICK HERE: INSIDE ECOLAB > IT > MOBILE SERVICES
CONNECTING YOU – EVERYWHERE IT MATTERS.
